info.title: Selling Partner API for Supply Sources
info.description: Manage configurations and capabilities of seller supply sources.

Error.description: An error response returned when the request is unsuccessful.

code.description: An error code that identifies the type of error that occurred.

message.description: A message that describes the error condition.

details.description: Additional details that can help the caller understand or fix the issue.

ErrorList.description: A list of error responses returned when a request is unsuccessful.

errors.description: A list of error responses returned when a request is unsuccessful.

GetSupplySourcesResponse.description: The paginated list of supply sources.

nextPageToken.description: If present, use this pagination token to retrieve the next page of supply sources.

UpdateSupplySourceStatusRequest.description: A request to update the status of a supply source.

CreateSupplySourceRequest.description: A request to create a supply source.

CreateSupplySourceResponse.description: The result of creating a new supply source.

UpdateSupplySourceRequest.description: A request to update the configuration and capabilities of a supply source.

SupplySource.description: The supply source details, including configurations and capabilities.

SupplySourceConfiguration.description: Includes configuration and timezone of a supply source.

timezone.description: Please see RFC 6557, should be a canonical time zone ID as listed here: https://www.joda.org/joda-time/timezones.html.

SupplySourceCapabilities.description: The capabilities of a supply source.

SupplySourceId.description: An Amazon generated unique supply source ID.

SupplySourceCode.description: The seller-provided unique supply source code.

SupplySourceAlias.description: The custom alias for this supply source

OutboundCapability.description: The outbound capability of a supply source.

ServicesCapability.description: The services capability of a supply source.

isSupported.description: When true, `SupplySource` supports the Service capability.

PickupChannel.description: The pick up channel of a supply source.

inStorePickupConfiguration.description: The configuration for supporting in-store pickup.

curbsidePickupConfiguration.description: The configuration for supporting curbside pickup.

parkingCostType.description: The type of cost at parking location.

parkingSpotIdentificationType.description: The type of parking spot identification used at parking location.

ParkingSpotIdentificationType.description: The type of parking spot identification.

InStorePickupConfiguration.description: The in-store pickup configuration of a supply source.

isSupported.description: When true, in-store pickup is supported by the supply source (default: `isSupported` value in `PickupChannel`).

parkingConfiguration.description: The parking configuration for in-store pickup.

CurbsidePickupConfiguration.description: The curbside pickup configuration of a supply source.

isSupported.description: When true, curbside pickup is supported by the supply source.

operationalConfiguration.description: The operational configuration for the curbside pickup configuration.

parkingWithAddressConfiguration.description: The parking configuration for curbside pickup with address for customers to use.

ParkingWithAddressConfiguration.description: The parking configuration with the address.

address.description: The address of the parking location.

DeliveryChannel.description: The delivery channel of a supply source.

ReturnLocation.description: The address or reference to another `supplySourceId` to act as a return location.

supplySourceId.description: The Amazon provided `supplySourceId` where orders can be returned to.

phone.description: The phone number of the person, business or institution.

startTime.description: The opening time, ISO 8601 formatted timestamp without date, HH:mm.

endTime.description: The closing time, ISO 8601 formatted timestamp without date, HH:mm.

NonNegativeInteger.description: An unsigned integer that can be only positive or zero.

EmailAddress.description: The email address to which email messages are delivered.

name.description: The name of the person, business or institution at that address.

addressLine1.description: The first line of the address.

addressLine2.description: The additional address information, if required.

addressLine3.description: The additional address information, if required.

city.description: The city where the person, business or institution is located.

county.description: The county where person, business or institution is located.

district.description: The district where person, business or institution is located.

stateOrRegion.description: The state or region where person, business or institution is located.

postalCode.description: The postal code of that address. It conatins a series of letters or digits or both, sometimes including spaces or punctuation.

countryCode.description: The two digit country code. In ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.

phone.description: The phone number of the person, business or institution located at that address.

DateTime.description: A date and time in the rfc3339 format.

get.description: The path to retrieve paginated supply sources.

parameters.name: nextPageToken
parameters.description: The pagination token to retrieve a specific page of results.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of supply sources to return per paginated request.
